website_summaries.verdict: A powerful air dryer that you can easily adjust the speed and angle of to get the job done quickly.
pros: 3 speed settings and 4 different angles for drying
Built-in circuit breaker and 2 outlets for accessories
Built-in timer, so you can use the dryer when away from home
cons: Some customers have reported that the product broke down on them after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: This fan blows.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan because I needed something to cool my flat in hot summer days and I've a friend that uses the two of the same fan to cool off his garage whilst we're working out. I love this fan as it moves a lot of air. I use it to cool my flat and specially whilst I'm cooking in the kitchen which makes my small flat a lot hotter. I set the timer to 2 hours on power level 1 and point it towards the kitchen and it cools down the kitchen significantly. Now I can cook more since I can handle the heat in the kitchen. This fan blows, I'm a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several fans and weighed out the price and features and put all items to consider on the table. I choose this fan for several reasons. 1-can connect to other fans, 2-has a timer that can shut off, 3-powerful yet quiet, 4-price compared to other fans. It delivered all of the above items under 100 bucks!!!! I use them to dry floors for my property management company and they are awesome!!! A few connected will dry out a room in no time flat!! I use them when our company paints, has wet carpets from hurricanes, and just when there is heavy moisture in the air for our oceanfront condos. I am a fan and will buy more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Decent Blowing Force
customer_reviews.text: This thing BLOWS!!! I wasted time on the big gray and black Lazko and I’m returning it. I do wish I could find a more powerful fan than this to help my outside dogs get a breeze in the summer, but this is better than anything I’ve seen so far and is affordable. I’ll be buying more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Tallgirl

customer_reviews.title: They don't last 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these 6 months ago and 2 are no longer working. I'm not really happy at all with the $200 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for a short time
customer_reviews.text: Used this fan lightly on and off for about 5 years. The fan sits inside my garage when not in use. During this period the fan motor developed rust and squeels when turned on to where it's just too load to use. Several screws are too rusted to come off and have stripped in place or else I would take it apart and oil the shaft to fix the squeeling. This fan should not have rusted like it did. It was used very little since bought. Ultimately had to throw it away, as a new motor was supposedly out of stock and cost around $50. Way to excessive. Would never by Xpower products again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lynn

customer_reviews.title: X POWER P-230 AT
customer_reviews.text: You will not find a better compact blower. This thing runs constantly at my house to circulate air all year round. LOW power consumption with 3 speeds, and timer to shut off... and two outlets. ITS THE BOMB!!! Im hard on stuff and this thing already paid for itself... do your self a favor... when you buy something and they offer a 7 dollar 3 year warranty dont be cheap and then a whiner in 6 months!!!
customer_reviews.author: #iboughtone

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your hard earned money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 in September 2016. By July 2017, 2 of the 4 have had the 3 speed switches burn out. Tried to purchase replacement switches and the manufacturer site stated that they were no longer available. To send back for a warrant repair was going to cost $65 each. Definitely an issue with their product. I would never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Richberg

customer_reviews.title: A little beast!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blower. 3 speeds. The first one is already powerful, the second and third are almost identical and really move a lot of air. You can position it horizontal with or without the little leg to raise it up by 1 inch which is 0 to 10 degrees (which I used to dry an AC pan. Or vertical which blows air up at about 45 or 60 degree angle (which I used to dry a door I had varnished). It's really sturdy and powerful yet very portable. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: This powerful affordable fan is a must!
customer_reviews.text: This little powerful friend has been running on high 100% of the time since I purchased it, making it #5! Recent rains caused water table to rise, flooding our basement. This fan has helped dehumidify and keep air moving. It’s easy to reposition, sturdy, and has 3 easy to choose speeds. Knobs all on front, big enough to select even in low light. Little feet handy. It’s loud on high, but a constant moving air noise. No clatter or vibration sound. I love these fans.
customer_reviews.author: Lana J.

customer_reviews.title: Great garage floor fan, but in cold climates don't expect it to dry up slush and snow.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the garage because our SUV's bring in snow during the winter. As it melts it pools up or runs towards the walls. I bought this in hopes it would dry it up before it turned into a swamp. Honestly I was asking too much from this fan however, it performs really well! Yes it doesn't dry it up from two SUV's but if you squeegee the floor and let this do the rest, it can sure do that job no problem! Lets put it this way, I will always own one.
customer_reviews.author: Russ R.

customer_reviews.title: Blows my mind!
customer_reviews.text: Quality 5/5 Features 5/5 Price 5/5 This product gets you more than what you buy it for. For the price theirs no comparing how crazy the 3 strength levels are! I would buy this again if it ever comes down to needed another fan. I use this for hot summers and the air power is amazing! I’m done buying from other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan has helped out tremendously with our basement flooding. It is very powerful and dries up water and wetness quickly. It's nice that it has a timer on it so it doesn't have to run constantly while we're not home. Decent quality material and the brand is very good with customer service for any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use on a hot food truck and used it twice already this weekend. Even at its lowest speed, it made us so much cooler! We positioned it without using the feet to prop it up and it worked well without blowing out our pilot lights. Not too loud and very light weight. It certainly made our lives easier to have air movement and definitely cooled us down. So glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wise Cowart

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW
customer_reviews.text: Small but mighty. Don’t let the small footprint fool you! This thing is an amazing room air circulator. It actually makes me too cold, which I am totally ok with. Started out to get some air flow in a long hallway but being that it hasn’t been so hot outside it has bee promoted to the garage to blow the exhaust fumes away outside of the garage and is doing a great job of it.
customer_reviews.author: EVOMIZ

customer_reviews.title: its louder than i hoped
customer_reviews.text: measured 70db at the unit.. about 2000 fpm of air on low setting. i wanted to run this 100% but its just too noisy for that. its really a garage or outdoor type of thing. it does put out a lot of air
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: XPOWER 848025023419 P-230AT Fans: Small, portable, and well made
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend these XPOWER 848025023419 P-230AT fans. They are smaller than you expect, but still move a ton of air. I use mine to dry off a wet job site after a rain. They have 3 fan speeds, a timer, and come with both a fuse and 120v outlets right on the side of the fan. Awesome fans for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Blur

customer_reviews.title: Great fans that blow like a Hurricane Andrew.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these fans about three years ago . I purchased one from Lowes and the other two from Amazon. All three fans work continuously as I use them to ventilate the engine rooms on large yachts while I work on their marine diesel engines . These three fans have never missed a beat . I would most definitely recommend these fans for industrial use .
customer_reviews.author: Terry E Hosmer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Amazing air volume and the timer is a nice addition. We like to sleep with our fan running, but it would be to much to have on you all night, so the timer is perfect. I have even used it to blow the leaves off of our back deck when the cord to our blower broke. **** When you first use this fan you will smell something that smells like smoke. It dissipates with a little time. The motor has to break in and it can generate a burning smell.
customer_reviews.author: BigKEBD

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fan
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a powerful little fan for the price. It has 3 speeds and an optional timer. The fan is pretty quiet. There are more powerful fans with more horsepower, but this one works well for the price. I got it to dry out dampness under the house from a leaking pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Akin

customer_reviews.title: Loud and powerful
customer_reviews.text: The unit is loud and powerful. Much more effective than I normally need. Low speed works well for me. The ability to tilt the fan at different angles is nice. I used it twice to deal with small spills. The only complaint I have is about the loudness.
customer_reviews.author: Edwards_CSG

customer_reviews.title: Moves a lot of air and is solidly built
customer_reviews.text: I accidentially dropped this from my toolbox onto a concrete floor about 40" and it just bounced like a ball. No damage whatsoever. I plugged it in and it fired right up. Seems to move more air than the older Lasko fans that I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: Was a great fan. Now after 15 months of occasional use, the motor barely turns over when switched on. The manufacturer's description claimed " its [sic] meant to be durable and last for years of service."
customer_reviews.author: Bobber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy, efficient, fabulous air mover.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these..then two more a few days later, then one more. That’s 5! Our basement flooded due to record breaking rainfall, which necessitated drying out and dehumidifying the basement plus keeping humidity down on upper level. The fans have been running 100% along with 3 dehumidifiers, since the trouble started. Our good restoration company came out, tested humidity levels and said we were doing great! Easy positioning allows rooms to be dried from any angle.
customer_reviews.author: Lana J.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent air mover.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is solid and reliable. Great for drying out a flooded area and also good for airing out a hot garage without having to open up the door more than a crack at the bottom. Easily adjustable air flow for direction or force. A good tool to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific power in such a small size!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific power in such a small size! Solid built. If you need some good fan power but don't want to carry around a large heavy beast then this is it. I'm in the carpet cleaning business and a couple of these is all I need. Then again, I don't over wet carpets and I'm not in the "restoration" business.
customer_reviews.author: Humungus

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. It's not huge but it has a huge heart! It's great for spots/areas, not a whole floor/room. Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer
customer_reviews.text: Our basement flooded and this little gem came in handy. It did the job as advertised. We even used it to help our screened in porch dry faster after we spring cleaned it with a mop, bucket, and hose. It dried it in minutes instead of all day.
customer_reviews.author: kld311

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower at a very competitive price!
customer_reviews.text: Blows a great blast of air dependably, every time. Easy to operate. Extra plug ins on the side. I use it on my dogs to help them stay cool in the summer and dry during rainy weather. Wish it had longer than 3 hr timer but that's minor. If I had spilled water, e.g. leaking hot water heater, it would be perfect to blow it dry. Packed well. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as advertised, very powerful..
customer_reviews.text: Green was less expensive fo hatever reason???..very powerful...built in timer can be over-ridden which to me was important...using it to circulate air in crawl space, so far so goo, running it about 2 1/2 hrs a day
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Nice blower.
customer_reviews.text: Nice small air mover for inside the house. Moves A LOT of air on high setting. It is louder than I anticipated, so I dropped a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: HeavyMetalMechanic

customer_reviews.title: Mini Powerhouse, but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Personally I like the white noise it generates, but even on the lowest setting this fan can be pretty loud. As a fan, this thing moves alot of air and it's perfect for my purposes. I also like the adjustments you can make to push the air either horizontally or almost vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan. Liked it so much I purchased one for my brother.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome fan. Moves air where it's needed for me. Air to noise ratio is acceptable. I own both a blue and a green fan and I am very satisfied with both. Yes I would recommend it. Update, one of the green fans started making noise on start up. Would eventually guiet down. Returned for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Best shop fan for the dive and money I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a dealer mechanic and the shop gets pretty hot during the humid summers here in Pa. I snagged 2 of these and the air they move is incredible, it’s as small as my buddies blowers he got from harbor freight but mine move more than double the air. 2 more techs at my shop ordered their own after seeing mine. I’ll see how they hold up to daily use but I’m very impressed with these blowers!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air mover👍
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, works perfectly, love the two elect ports so it acts as an extension port for my job site. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: CaptJF

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but the CFM output very surprising. if they would lower the price I would buy several more. recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: move a lot of air !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: we use it at a car audio shop, and it move a lot of air!!!!!!!! great for the price!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario L.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!! A+ Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: For the money $$$ this is by far the best fan you can get!! I've been through lots of fans/different brands, none of them even came close to the power this thing has and the 2 power outlets on the side is always something great to have!! So if you're thinking about getting a new fan weather it's for professional use or you just want to stay cool... You won't be disappointed with this fan!! Overall A+ can't wait to buy another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gualtieri

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Working great for basement use. I get some water in the basement from time to time and this has been a great help. You can set it for time increments so I don't have to check on it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin151

customer_reviews.title: These work great.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for the price. 800 CFM max for those who want to know.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Pedreros

customer_reviews.title: Little fan packs a huge punch
customer_reviews.text: I'm a remodeler and I need an army of fans on multiple jobs to help with speeding up the process of demo (dust/air exchange), drywall drying and paint. This little fan is a giant in moving a volume of air to expedite those processes that always eat up time. It is compact so it does not need a bunch of space in my truck or in a room. It has a timer so I can set it to run for a few hours after I leave a job for the day. It has onboard plug-ins so I can run a daisy chain of fans or even plug in a battery charger or a work light. Affordable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Power in a small package
customer_reviews.text: XPower P-230AT pack a lot of power in a small fan. The built-in power outlets are handy for charging my phone and listening to music outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and quite portable.
customer_reviews.text: This little air mover is almost as powerful as its industrial sized big brothers. 800 CFM is a lot more power than it sounds like. With all the rain and flooding, this little fan sure got a workout and did an excellent job. I was able to raise and dry out 400 Sqft of carpet, as it dried it floated and waved over the stream of air, not at all what I expected form such a small package.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schulman

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and well built!...moves a lot of air, works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thing to have to save $$$
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice for drying up wet bathrooms and wet basement carpets (about 1000 sq. ft approx. times 2). Put two units to use for 3 days and 3 night continous operation and it did the job fantasically well. We did use wet vaccum to suck excess water out before the blowers were let loose. We not only saved $$$ but fit the intended purpose very well. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 months in & I love it (does exactly what I need it to do)
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months & I gotta say it's as good as others are saying. For me, HomeDepot rentals were getting a bit much (I was nearly paying for one of these with a 2 to 3 day rental [a bigger version of course]). First use was a little stinky (I think wiring near the motor or build lube), but I really it's a great performer... & it's small. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: SimonSays

customer_reviews.title: Easy portable air circulation
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for air circulation and I use it for white noise to help me sleep
customer_reviews.author: Mistism66

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Working as I need it to work. We don't use too much, but I do believe I will be purchasing some more for our smaller drywall jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Circle A

customer_reviews.title: Will blow your socks off!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for a stage fan for outdoor shows . Like a sauna here in Florida in the summer and outdoor shows are a bitch but got to play either way. A bit loud. Not recommended for small stage or venues.
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fan is small and lightweight, but it produces a good amount of air power while remaining fairly quiet. We are pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: SmallTownPeeps

customer_reviews.title: blow ya down
customer_reviews.text: blow ya down air movment awesome dryer can be set in on position or timer set from zero to three hrs I realy liked this because I could set timer after cleaning carpet and leave knowing it would shut down automatically
customer_reviews.author: luke reisinger

customer_reviews.title: DID THE JOB HELPED HURRY REPAIRS FOR UNDER-HOUSE EXCESS HUMIDITY AND DAMAGE
customer_reviews.text: USED TO AIR DRY UNDER-HOUSE EXCESS HUMIDITY WHEN FAN WENT OUT .. THIS HELPED DRY OUT EVERYTHING .. TOO BAD I DIDN'T HAVE IT BEFORE THE REPAIRS COST ME $6,000!!
customer_reviews.author: annointed shopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: HP at its finest. Barely need to go past stage 1
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a fan and circulating the air conditioning air throughout the place and its kicking tail! Feels like a air conditioner is on. And its sturdy, with great quality. Dries a floor fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: juan valdez

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for Zwift
customer_reviews.text: Works really well on low or medium during Zwift races
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Wiebe

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my garage. We have also used it in the house after shampooing the carpet to expedite the drying process and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sloppy McFloppy

customer_reviews.title: The POWER this thing has!
customer_reviews.text: VERY good air flow, especially for something this small. Built well. Pretty loud on high, but so is anything else. The most airflow of anything this size, for sure! Love the extra outlets. Timer comes in handy. Highly recommend, worth the money! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: This unit did the job perfectly, was quite, and easy to handle. It was used to dry out a damp area in garage and basement.
customer_reviews.author: Harold L. Durst

customer_reviews.title: Compact and strong.
customer_reviews.text: It’s powerful and compact. Not to big to tote around in an attic. Pushes a lot of air for its size.
customer_reviews.author: micah qualls

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great and so powerful. only issue is it sometimes takes a lot of power and depending on the generator it shorts out. otherwise its super durable and the plugs are great. I am a structural welder and it couldnt take more of a beating
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to position
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to position. I love that the cord wraps conveniently around the face of it when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Dropped many times, works like new.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a carpet cleaner. This is a great fan. The outlets on the side are handy, a feature not found on my more expensive units. This was on one time and I dropped it out of the van.... Works fine, looks pro. I might buy a second.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Blows lots of air!
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a lot of air and is relatively quiet for the amount of air it can move outside. Also, compact for the power.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Works great for small jobs and produces a lot of air for drying carpets quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tensina

customer_reviews.title: Having an issue with it after only a dozen or ...
customer_reviews.text: Having an issue with it after only a dozen or so uses. Sometimes it comes on, others, it doesn't. Not sure if they constructed it with a cheap switch or there is loose wiring inside.
customer_reviews.author: T Leggio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works GREAT for drying out my screen room after a rain - would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Moves that air!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This machine puts out some real air...........on low!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: This is built really well and moves tons of air. I use it on stage to spread fog and provide some cool air movement. Even on the lowest setting its plenty of air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Wao...Amazing!!! Super strong, great quality. Works super good...I totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: AnaysS

customer_reviews.title: This thing blew me away, or at least all my empty beer cans.
customer_reviews.text: This blower must be stronger than any other of the same size. This blower is rugged, and very very powerful. I was assigned one at work and WOW! I mean so much WOW that I purchased 2 for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing performance and value in such a small and convient package.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to fix hot Summer nights for a few years. This pulls the air in from outside in no time. The timer is a great added feature. I've not had the chance to use the receptacle. I'm comfortable now. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: CFM Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great little blower
customer_reviews.text: Great little blower! Lots of power in a compact size. Dries carpet great! I also use it to cool down during a work out. Very portable too!
customer_reviews.author: Michele C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Not to big . Easy for storage in my enclosed trailer . Air movement and quality are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Really excellent performance and value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My handyman was so impressed with mine that he got one for himself.
customer_reviews.author: MikeChicago

customer_reviews.title: Moves air!
customer_reviews.text: Moves air very well and outlets on side are very handy when camping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lost of power.
customer_reviews.text: Nice powerful fan. I bought these to dry out behind my stud wall after out basement flooded. It worked great!
customer_reviews.author: marissa keene

customer_reviews.title: Great little air mover
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a little air mover it puts out just enough air as I use this to dry floor patching everyday. The best part is its small so I can fit it on a shelf in my work van. On the highest setting the air mover will blow everything around in the room so I usually only use the first or second.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This thing really puts out a lot of air. We tested it out in my open concept living room with vaulted ceiling and it really had the air moving! For the price I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: It really "blows"!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great fan. I'm amazed at how powerful it is! I have a 3 bedroom, 1360 sq. ft. house in a desert climate. My living room is on the west side, so in the afternoon it can get quite warm while the "back" of the house stays relatively cool. I can put this fan in the bedroom at the far east end of the house and point it towards the living room and it's powerful enough to move cooler air all the way down the hall and into the living room. It's really quite impressive!
customer_reviews.author: J. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product -- Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a great product. The size is deceptive . . . it sends a very strong current for about 20 feet. Exactly what I needed to dry my garage floor after power washing it. I would recommend this blower to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Price

customer_reviews.title: good to have
customer_reviews.text: woks fantastic set the timer an let it dry things up
customer_reviews.author: NICK

customer_reviews.title: loves this
customer_reviews.text: i bought 2 of them to dry my basement cause it flooded things a powerful as hell. i use them now to move the ac air around making the ac's cover more area love it
customer_reviews.author: Sean Pescatello

customer_reviews.title: Must have for humid homes!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at cooling off a room and creating air flow. We have a studio apartment and it feels like a beautiful spring breeze in here.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny LA

customer_reviews.title: Is smaller than I thought, looking at photos.
customer_reviews.text: Nice air mover. Pretty quiet even on high. Like all possible positions it sits in.
customer_reviews.author: Crater Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable to get the job done. This helped dry a soaked carpet within hours.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN N.

customer_reviews.title: great buy, can't go wrong with these
customer_reviews.text: love these lil guys. easy to use. 3 power settings plus an optional timer. will be buying a few more for my carpet cleaning business.
customer_reviews.author: jonjonoo7

customer_reviews.title: small but powerful. Put in 4 car garage and ...
customer_reviews.text: small but powerful. Put in 4 car garage and it moves air well.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: I have put 3000-4000 hours on this unit and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have put 3000-4000 hours on this unit and it is still going strong. I just purchased a second one. Well built, powerful and reasonably quiet for the CFM.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: moves air exactly as expected. I noticed THD sales almost the same thing now for more money
customer_reviews.author: VistaGlenn

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. I love the timer feature and long cord ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I love the timer feature and long cord along with the outlets on the side of the unit. Would highly recommend. They make more powerful units but this suits my needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: MacMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These have worked flawlessly. They have been running continuous for about 4 weeks without fail. Compact and powerful!
customer_reviews.author: R. Shane Marchand

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for after carpet shampooing
customer_reviews.text: Moves a whole lot of air in a fairly quiet manner. Very nice for after carpet shampooing.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: It worked great and dried up a indoor/outdoor carpet after minor flood ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great and dried up a indoor/outdoor carpet after minor flood damage. We were so glad we purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Garnet

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: Amazing blower. The amount of air it moves is incredible. Wish it was a tad more adjustable though, kinda tips over if you try to prop it up. Overall a great fan.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with it's performance
customer_reviews.text: This powerful little fan ran 24/7 for several days while we dried out a flood. Very pleased with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Wildenhaus

customer_reviews.title: This fan blows
customer_reviews.text: I had this fan, until it went missing on the job site. I liked it enough to buy it again. Quiet for amount of air it moves.
customer_reviews.author: colin campbell

customer_reviews.title: Lots of AIR!!!
customer_reviews.text: This came well packaged, it is a nice little powerful machine, for my crawl space under my mobile home, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Linda HouckLambert

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These small fans are great. I've rented the giant versions but to own I'd highly recommend these smaller ones. They are easy to move and conveniently stored after use. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: Bought one to air out my basement, it worked so well I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it and am delighted to own it
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of rain and melting snow causing water to seep into our basement carpeting. This blower dried the water up almost instantly, less than a day, when all other solutions failed. I highly recommend it and am delighted to own it.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Altemose

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good condition. It moves a lot of air and is pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

product_meta.title: XPOWER P-230AT Mini Mighty Air Mover Utility Blower Fan with Built-In Power Outlets, Blue
product_meta.description:
The powerful XPOWER X-600A 1/3 hp Air Mover speeds up the drying process for water damage restoration and janitorial cleaning applications. Drawing only 3.8 amps and blasting up to 2,400 cfm, this unit will get the job done quickly and efficiently. An on-board GFCI power outlet that is daisy-chainable up to 3 units eliminates the need for pesky extension cord setup. The 4 positioning angles allow for drying floors, ceilings, walls and more. Manufactured with rugged state-of-the-art injection mold technology, the X-600A's commercial-grade housing and motor will ensure optimum performance and years of service.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
So much power in such a small machine! The P-230AT weighing in at a mere 11.2 lbs. provides up to 800 CFM making it the perfect tool to tackle any job around the house. Made from the same design as professional air movers the P-230AT is a perfect way to get professional performance right in your own home. Have water damage around your house? No Problem! Have a nasty smell you want to get out of the house? It works for that as well! This machine is also made with polypropylene plastics, which means it’s meant to be durable and last for years of service
feature_bullets: INCREASE AIR FLOW AND VENTILATION: Ideal for offices, stores, workshops, and any spaces where fresh air is lacking
ENERGY EFFICIENT 1/5 HP MOTOR: Produces up to 800 CFM while drawing only 2.3 amps at its highest setting
BUILT-IN POWER OUTLETS: Daisy chain multiple fans for a wider range of coverage
ADJUSTABLE FEATURES: 3 speeds and 4 drying positions with a built-in kickstand
LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE: Measures 10.7" x 12.4" x 13.3" and weighs only 9.9 pounds with a built-in handle for convenient storage and transportation

specifications.Included Components: P-230AT Mini Mighty Air Mover with Built-In Power Outlets and Timer x 1, Owner’s Manual x 1
